addText.text: Dear participant, Welcome to our study! We are the Crossmodal Research Laboratory, Department of Experimental Psychology, Oxford University. We are interested in understanding how people associate information across the senses. If you decide to take part in this experiment, you will be asked to match colours with taste words and will be asked some questions about your choice and about the colours. There are not right or wrong responses, please respond according to what it feels right to you. We hope you enjoy it. Your participation is very important to us.
When the stimuli have loaded (below bar), please click 'Continue'
please tell us your Prolific Academic participant ID

addText.text: In each trial you will see a colour patch in the middle of the screen. Please tell us what tastes you associate with the colour patch as a whole by pressing the appropriate buttons. Please do so quickly but not at the expense of accuracy. There are 11 trials in total. To start the study, position your fingers over the o k z x keys and press a key.
Please tell us what tastes you associate with with the colour patch as a whole by clicking the appropriate buttons.

Thank you for your participation to this study. We're exploring the way people associate colours with tastes.
